title: On $(k\oplus l |q)$-dimensional supermanifolds
abstract: We define a $(k\oplus l|q)$-dimensional supermanifold as a manifold having q odd coordinates and k + l even coordinates with l of them taking only nilpotent values. We show that this notion can be used to formulate superconformal field theories with different number of supersymmetries in holomorphic and antiholomorphic sectors.
